settings.title: Custom text
settings.text:
Powered by Tobi.
© 2021 Happy Plumber

settings.title: Mountain Fresh water from your own tap, every time.
settings.text:
We're European leaders in water filtration products, allowing you to enjoy that pure, crystal clean taste in every glass.

Over the last 20 years, we've offered products which take advantage of the most up to date micro-technology, so that you can drink the cleanest, safest & tastiest drinking water.

settings.subtitle: Why choose us?
settings.title: Explain your brand philosophy
settings.text: Use this section to explain your company philosophy or standards. Showcase lifestyle photography for added emphasis. This content will appear on all products.

settings.title: Testimonials
settings.testimonial_1: Add customer reviews and testimonials to showcase your store’s happy customers and to provide social proof.
settings.testimonial_2: Add customer reviews and testimonials to showcase your store’s happy customers and to provide social proof.

settings.title:
Feel the fresh
in every sip.
Quench your thirst for a year, on us!
settings.text: Be in with a chance to win one year's worth of replacement filters for your water filtration system. New winners announced every month, just drop your email below!

settings.subtitle: Why shop with us?
settings.title: European Leaders in Water Filtration
settings.text: Our plug and play solutions offer you the purest & freshest drinking water in every glass. Enjoy mountain fresh & crystal clean water from your own tap!

settings.popup_title: Quench your thirst for a year, on us!
settings.popup_text: Be in with a chance to win one year's worth of replacement filters for your water filtration system. New winners announced every month, just drop your email below.

settings.heading: Eco Water Filters
settings.textarea: Enjoy superior cleaning properties from our washable & reusable water filter. Up to five years of fresh drinking water while doing your bit against non-reusable plastics.

settings.heading: Soft Hair is back!
settings.textarea: Enjoy smooth skin & soft hair from our chrome shower head. Filtering 99% of chlorine from your water, leaving you with a healthy & clean showering experience.

settings.heading: Replacement Packs
settings.text: Keep your great tasting water by replacing your filter cartridges.
settings.label: Shop now

settings.heading: Banner promotion
settings.text: Add the details of your promotion in smaller text
settings.label: Shop now

settings.heading: Your Complete Filtration System.
settings.textarea: Eliminate everything from your water, from bad chlorine taste to the finest micro-plastics.

settings.title: The tap that does it all
settings.text: Give your countertop a sleeker look with one tap for hot, cold & filtered water. Integrate your filtered water into your home with one of our premium finished faucets.

settings.title: Ask the experts
settings.text: Not sure what filter suits you best? Get in touch to get a better idea of what filtration setup best suits your household. Don't be afraid to drop us a message below!

settings.title: What Filter do I need?
settings.text: It can be confusing trying to understand which filter is best for you. Checkout our quick guide below, where we take the stress out of choosing a water system.

settings.title: Water Filters
settings.text: Use this section for any descriptive text you need to fill out your pages or to add introductory headings between other blocks.

settings.title: The Happy Plumber
settings.subheading: Providing the purest water for the past 20 years.

settings.title: Constantly Pure, Instantly Filtered.
settings.text: We combat against everything from Chlorine to Cryptosporidium, Iron to E-coli. Our systems leave you with nothing but the safest, tastiest water.
